objects.specification: A large, seamless floor plane with a light gray finish, smooth texture and subtle matte sheen, designed to support furniture and foot traffic in an indoor classroom environment.
A tall, smooth front wall with an off-white paint finish, light texture and crisp edges, providing a clean backdrop for instructional materials.
A tall, smooth back wall with an off-white paint finish, light texture and crisp edges, suitable for mounting charts and posters.
A side wall painted in light gray with a smooth surface, minimalistic trim and a subtle matte finish, providing a neutral boundary for furnishings.
A side wall painted in light gray with a smooth surface, minimalistic trim and a subtle matte finish, providing a neutral boundary for furnishings.
A large rectangular teacher’s desk with a rich, dark wood tone finish, sturdy straight legs, a modesty panel, and a spacious smooth tabletop that accommodates teaching materials.
A high-back teacher’s chair upholstered in navy blue fabric, featuring padded armrests, contoured cushioning and a sturdy metal frame for ergonomic comfort.
A large rectangular whiteboard with a glossy white enamel surface, framed by slim silver aluminum trim, suitable for markers and easy erasing.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector with a white plastic housing, circular lens at the front, and ventilation grilles along the sides for classroom presentations.
A tall, dark wood bookshelf with five evenly spaced shelves, each shelf filled with a variety of colorful books, creating a scholarly accent along the wall.
A round wall clock with a white face, bold black numerals, slim black hands and a thin black frame, mounted for clear visibility.
A lush green potted plant with multiple broad leaves, planted in a simple terracotta-colored pot for a natural corner accent.
A simple cylindrical waste bin in medium gray plastic with a smooth matte finish and an open top for convenient disposal.
A simple cylindrical waste bin in medium gray plastic with a smooth matte finish and an open top for convenient disposal.
A large rectangular window with clear glass panes, slim white frame and subtle mullions, allowing abundant natural light into the classroom.
A pair of off-white, lightweight fabric curtains with gentle folds, hung on a slim rod to frame the window elegantly.
A colorful educational poster with laminated finish, featuring charts and diagrams to enhance the learning environment.
